Content: i just learned that i have a 55 in a class bc the teacher put in all of our grades over spring break
there are literally four fucking people in my class_ i go to a small liberal arts school so most of the teachers have a pretty good relationship with students_ its a 10 to 1 faculty to student ratio
could she have not told me about this? or told me to perform better? its not like its one bad grade its consistent half credit on homework
its a comp course and all of it is writing based and of course i get very minimal feedback when my homework is to read a 20 page essay and then write 500-750 words on it twice a week
i thought i was doing well based on our in class discussions and shit but im literally getting half credit on everything that i do
and the teacher just decided to put the grades in now
when i have 5 weeks left (and then finals week_ but we dont have a final in this class) to fix it
i have 9 classes left to turn my 55 into at least an 86 otherwise my gpa goes down
thanks for coming to my ted talk i just needed to vent and ugh if you have any advice pls @ me
